name: R2_v2_0468_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R2.v2 Payment Adjustment Code for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0468|2.8.2 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R4B.

concept.display: Designated current drug or biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator G)
Designated new device payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator H)
Designated new drug or new biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator J)
Deductible not applicable (specific list of HCPCS codes)

contains.display: Designated current drug or biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator G)
Designated new device payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator H)
Designated new drug or new biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator J)
Deductible not applicable (specific list of HCPCS codes)
